nodes.documentation: @title Crowdfunding Factory.
nodes.name: CrowdfundingFactory

nodes.documentation: @dev Validates if user is contract owner.
nodes.name: isOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev Disables use of function in emergency state.
nodes.name: stopInEmergency

nodes.documentation: @dev Enables use of function in emergency state.
nodes.name: onlyInEmergency

nodes.documentation: @dev Validates if campaign status is active.
nodes.name: active

nodes.documentation: @dev Validates if campaign status is failed.
nodes.name: failed

nodes.documentation: @dev Validates if campaign end date is greater than today date.
nodes.name: activeValidDate

nodes.documentation: @dev Validates if campaign goal is greater than campaign amount.
nodes.name: validAmount

nodes.documentation: @dev Validates if user is campaign's beneficiary.
nodes.name: isBeneficiary

nodes.documentation: @dev Toggles emergency state.
nodes.name: toggleEmergency
createCampaign

nodes.documentation:
@dev Contributes to a campaign.  
@param campaignID Id of the desired campaign.
nodes.name: contribute
getInvestorID
getInvestorInCampaign
goalReached

nodes.documentation:
@dev Changes state of campaign to failed and updates balance with the invested money value.
@param campaignID Id of the desired campaign.
nodes.name: failCampaign

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfers balance amount to investor when the campaign is in failed state.
@param campaignID Id of the desired campaign.
nodes.name: claimRefund

nodes.documentation:
@dev Pay debt of a campaign.
@param campaignID Id of the desired campaign.
nodes.name: payDebt
releaseHolderShares

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfers balance amount to investor when the campaign is in refunding state.
@param campaignID Id of the desired campaign.
nodes.name: claimShare

nodes.documentation: @dev Transfers investor's invested amount when is in emergency state.
nodes.name: withdrawEmergencyMoney
